description: Sets the amount of time in days that a given AppInstance retains data.

parameters.name: AppInstanceRetentionSettings
parameters.description: The time in days to retain data. Data type: number. ChannelRetentionSettings (dict) --- The length of time in days to retain the messages in a channel. RetentionDays (integer) --- The time in days to retain the messages in a channel.

nested_params.name: ChannelRetentionSettings
nested_params.description: The length of time in days to retain the messages in a channel.

nested_params.name: RetentionDays
nested_params.description: The time in days to retain the messages in a channel.

nested_items.name: AppInstanceRetentionSettings
nested_items.description: The time in days to retain data. Data type: number.

nested_items.name: ChannelRetentionSettings
nested_items.description: The length of time in days to retain the messages in a channel.

nested_items.name: RetentionDays
nested_items.description: The time in days to retain the messages in a channel.

nested_items.name: InitiateDeletionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the API deletes data.
